data.text: @SeanS16343093 @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield “More of an identity signifier?” Dude, wearing a cross says you follow Christ. You know, Love you neighbor, heal the sick…feed the poor. Or are you not familiar with the virtues of Christianity?
@MasonJamesShow @RealCrisPBacon @Tom_Svoboda @JustinLewis1977 @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield “Will masks stop you from breaking your arm? No? Hahaha checkmate libs!”

@katrosenfield An author once observed that it’s far easier to forgive someone who’s harmed us than it is to forgive someone we’ve harmed. Once you’ve participated in public shaming, you’re committed. Perhaps that’s why movements love it so much.
@RealCrisPBacon @Tom_Svoboda @ErikNelson5 @JustinLewis1977 @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield So how does lifestyle/diet prevent masks from working?

@ErikNelson5 @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield Not sure wearing a cross is a great example, that's more of an identity signifier. Moreover, the reason why progressive liberalism is worse than other religions is that it's a Calvinball religion and allows people to make up new virtue signalling categories whenever they want.
@sbdeem @katrosenfield Don’t disagree, but I think feelings are what drive politics, not the other way around.
@ErikNelson5 @HjgTweet @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield Says the guy who probably berated people for not wearing masks in a grocery store..
@ErikNelson5 @HjgTweet @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield He didn’t ‘go after them’ he said you can take those masks off and most of them did and were giddy with relief.

@Tom_Svoboda @MasonJamesShow @ErikNelson5 @JustinLewis1977 @LauriLinnea @katrosenfield Try again. You can claim numbers support your theory (erroneously) all you want. You fail to take lifestyle/diet into account. As a society, we are more unhealthy than Sweden. COVID attacks the obese and unhealthy. You must factor that in or the numbers you cite mean nothing.

@DirkDig21786284 @phamnuwen2 @cheesechoker @katrosenfield Ah! The conservative fantasy where viruses float around, unattached to spit, and use their tiny size to defeat masks. Cool story, bro! I’m sure, based on this, that you just sneeze in peoples faces. Why bother doing anything else, amiright?
